Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility tests
Methodologies: Selective and differential chromogenic agar culture
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for chromID MRSA agar, a selective and differential chromogenic medium to detect MRSA in nasal swabs, skin/structure samples, and positive blood cultures.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of MRSA to aid in prevention and control of MRSA in healthcare settings via anterior nares swabs, skin/skin structure specimens, and positive blood cultures; not intended for diagnosis, therapy guidance, or susceptibility determination.
